dublin_core.dcvalue: Kiersten Israel-Ballard, Technical Officer MNCH, PATH, Email: kisrael-ballard@path.org | Noah Perin, Commercialization Officer, PATH Email: nperin@path.org

Foneastra is an affordable ($600 USD) platform that leverages the use of mobile phones to precisely monitor pasteurization of donor breast milk. The system functions as a real-time temperature device and remote data recording tool.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:56Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 foneastra.pdf: 282593 bytes, checksum: 42b078c6273c50458122014b6cdb77a2 (MD5)

Funding was provided from a grant from the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation through the Grand Challenge Explorations Initiative, the University of Washington Department of Computer Science and Engineering
data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, sensors and point-of-care diagnostics, Child Health, Nutrition
